settingsForm.showVanilla: Show Vanilla (THCRAP-less) launch option in patch list
settingsForm.onlyOneExe: Only allow one executable to run

missing.thcrap_loader:
thcrap_loader.exe couldn't be found.
Make sure to put the application next to it!
missing.gamesJs:
games.js couldn't be found.
Make sure to run thcrap_configure.exe first!
missing.patchStacks:
No patch stacks could be found.
Make sure to run thcrap_configure.exe first!
missing.jsonParser: Newtonsoft.Json.dll is missing. Please make sure it has been copied over as well.

errors.noneSelected:
No patch stacks or executables selected!
Please select one!
errors.downloadError:
Couldn't download language files from GitHub. You either:
- Not Connected to the Internet
- This program has become so deprecated that the GitHub Repository doesn't exist.
- In a future where GitHub or the Internet doesn't exist.

kbSh.caption: Keyboard Shortcuts
kbSh.text:
Alt + F4: Close Application (default Windows shortcut)
Ctrl + R: Restart Application
Ctrl + O: Open selected patch stack
F1: Show Keyboard Shortcuts (this window)
F2: Favorite the selected item in the selected list

tooltips.startButton: Start executable with the selected settings
tooltips.patchFav: Add patch stack to favourites (or use F2 if it's the active selection)
tooltips.gamesFav: Add executable or exe to favourites (or use F2 if it's the active selection)
